<<<<<<< HEAD
Of receiving the communion in the company of such, whom we conceive not so good, holy, and rightly principled, as we wish they were.
[2], 3 [i.e. 6] p.
Printed for Richard Davis, Oxford : 1651.
Page 6 misnumbered 3. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 3d". "This anonymous, forlorn little tract is a plea for toleration in the matter treated .." -- Madan. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 3 [i.e. 6] p.
Printed for Richard Davis, Oxford : 1651.
